name: Trails
shortDescription: An extension that allows the drawing of trails with a shape painter.
description: This extension includes a behavior that adds actions to the shape painter, which will let you draw & erase trails.
The trails come with a variety of parameters like start & end color, start & end opacity and more.
You can use it to give some juice to the movement of anything (cursor, running player, projectile, etc)

eventsFunctions.description: Draws a trail from a start point to an end point.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawTrail
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw trail _PARAM2_ using _PARAM0_ starting from x: _PARAM3_ y: _PARAM4_, ending at x: _PARAM5_ y: _PARAM6_, color: _PARAM7_, length: _PARAM8_, start size: _PARAM9_ end size: _PARAM10_, start alpha: _PARAM11_ end alpha: _PARAM12_

eventsFunctions.description: Draws a trail from a start point to an end point with a start/end color.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawAdvancedTrail
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw advanced trail _PARAM2_ using _PARAM0_ starting from x: _PARAM3_ y: _PARAM4_, ending at x: _PARAM5_ y: _PARAM6_, start color: _PARAM7_ end color: _PARAM8_, length: _PARAM9_, start size: _PARAM10_ end size: _PARAM11_, start alpha: _PARAM12_ end alpha: _PARAM13_

eventsFunctions.description: Erases the trail from the object. (you have to call this action before drawing a new trail with the same name).
eventsFunctions.name: ClearTrail

parameters.description: The name of the trail you want to erase
parameters.name: trailName

eventsFunctions.description: Erases all trails from the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ClearAllTrails
